name: Jeff the Land Shark

abilities.name: Land Swim
abilities.details: Burrows into the ground, becoming untargetable and moving slightly faster. Cannot attack while swimming.

abilities.name: Surprise Attack
abilities.range: Short lunge from ground (Requires Land Swim?)
abilities.details: Leaps out from the ground (or regular surface?) to deliver a powerful bite.

ultimate.name: Feeding Frenzy
ultimate.effect: Enters a frenzy for ~6 seconds, significantly increasing attack speed and bite damage.
ultimate.details: Goes into a hyperactive state of biting.

passives.name: Adorable Menace
passives.details: Small hitbox. Can potentially fit through small environmental gaps.

teamups.effect: Can ride on Groot's shoulder. Land Swim duration increased near specific allies?

lore: An infant land shark adopted by Gwenpool (and later Deadpool). Jeff is deceptively cute and capable of swimming through solid surfaces.
